title: Retro Watch Pro
summary: Retro watch faces for retro lovers!
description: Retro watch faces for retro lovers!Do you still remember the old computer monitor? Show time, date and day of weeks in green or amber monitor, or transform the watch into LED or LCD watch! You can also add custom text to the watch face!★ Select from 3 retro screen fonts: Monitor, LED or LCD.★ Select from 4 different font colors: Green, Amber, Red or White.★ Add custom text to the watch face - just speak to the watch! ★ Add name on your watch face or quotes like "think different"★ Add simple messages or reminders like "call wife" or "buy food".★ You can also enter emojis or use the keyboard on Android Wear 2 watches!★ Supports both round and square face watches. For best result, choose the following combination: Green or Amber Monitor, Red LED, White LCD.To configure or add/edit custom text, long press and select the gear button under the watch face.
descriptionHTML:
Retro watch faces for retro lovers!

Do you still remember the old computer monitor? Show time, date and day of weeks in green or amber monitor, or transform the watch into LED or LCD watch! You can also add custom text to the watch face!

★ Select from 3 retro screen fonts: Monitor, LED or LCD.
★ Select from 4 different font colors: Green, Amber, Red or White.
★ Add custom text to the watch face - just speak to the watch!
★ Add name on your watch face or quotes like "think different"
★ Add simple messages or reminders like "call wife" or "buy food".
★ You can also enter emojis or use the keyboard on Android Wear 2 watches!
★ Supports both round and square face watches.

For best result, choose the following combination: Green or Amber Monitor, Red LED, White LCD.
To configure or add/edit custom text, long press and select the gear button under the watch face.
comments: the idea is so cool. love it
I have always loved the old watches from the past and this is a reminder of them - brilliant
I like it, but the always on functionality is broken for 24 hour clock. The message disappears and the seconds are replaced with AM/PM which makes no sense in 24 hours.

Time is not centered on Moto 360 2nd Gen Id give 5 stars if the time wasnt misaligned on my watch. I've seen other people say the same,  hopefully there will be a bug fix soon.  I can provide screenshots if the dev needs them
Simple, but 12h only This would be my favourite minimal watch face if it used 24h time.
Quite like it. It would be improved with 24 hour time and a toggle to disable ambient mode.  Then it'd be perfect ;-)  ** hint hint dev :)
recentChanges: • Text size will scale up and down depends on length.
• Support text and emoji inputs for Android Wear 2 watches!
